results.title: Jack London's 'To build a fire'
results.creator_credit: Robert Stitzel, Molly Miles and BFA Educational Media

results.title: Keeping people alive: malnutrition - the hidden killer
results.creator_credit: Alan Hart, Ian McFarlane and World Focus
results.brief_description: Malnutrition kills 15 million young children each year and damages countless more. It slowly erodes physical and mental health. More help is needed from rich nations. From “Five minutes to midnight” (Title code 506172).

results.title: Vertical
results.creator_credit: David Hall and Arts Council of Great Britain
results.brief_description: Both a simple catalogue of verticals and a series of visual paradoxes exploring illusions of straightness and squareness and the notion of frame. A stimulus film showing recurrence of geometrics in nature. No dialogue.

results.title: Elementary mathematics for teachers and students: games
results.creator_credit: Davidson Films and General Learning Corporation
results.brief_description: An animated film for in-service work and the classroom. Two strategy games are played, one of co-ordinates, the second where two players take turns to erase a specified number of marks. Once the children have learnt these games they can progress to other games related to “rim”, eg games that use matches, or boardgames with counters. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
results.title_for_label: Elementary mathematics for teachers and students: games
results.description: An animated film for in-service work and the classroom.
